MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoWordSelection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定在用户通过在单词中拖动鼠标来选择单词的一部分时是否同时选定该单词的其余部分。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether when a user selects part of a word by dragging across it with the mouse, the rest of the word is selected.

value.span: 如果启用自动选择字词，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic word selection is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是启用，每次用户使用鼠标单词的一部分上拖动选择该单词的一部分时，所选内容会自动扩展以包括全字。When is enabled, every time that part of a word is selected by the user dragging over part of a word using the mouse, the selection is automatically expanded to include the whole word. 用户可以通过暂时反过来，在其中将鼠标指针正在拖动所作的选择的方向重写整个单词自动选定内容。The user can override automatic selection of a whole word by momentarily reversing the direction in which the mouse pointer is being dragged as the selection is made. 此操作将撤消整个单词而自动选择并使用户能够准确选择部分和所有单词。This action undoes the automatic selection of the whole word, and enables the user to precisely select part or all of the word. 当是禁用，选择未自动展开以包括全字; 在这种情况下，手动始终确定精确的选择。When is disabled, a selection is not automatically expanded to include whole words; in this case, precise selections are always determined manually. **注意：**自动选择不会影响在用户拖动的第一个单词。**Note:** Auto selection does not affect the first word that the user drags across. 它是仅后此第一个字边界跨越自动选择将生效。It is only after this first word boundary is crossed that auto selection takes effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginChange() cil managed

summary.span: 开始更改块。

span.span: Begins a change block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **注意：**当调用，你还必须调用以完成更改块否则将引发异常。**Note:** When you call , you must also call to complete the change block otherwise an exception will be thrown. 更改块进行逻辑分组到单个撤消单元的多个更改，并防止文本内容或所选内容更改事件之前发生的更改的块。A change block logically groups multiple changes into a single undo unit and prevents text content or selection change events from being raised until after the change block. 这样可以进行多个用户编辑，而无担心由另一个侦听器在同一时间更改的文本元素的文本元素。This way you can make multiple edits to the text element without the danger of the text element being changed at the same time by another listener. 通过调用创建更改块方法。A change block is created by calling the method. 调用方法使所有后续更改指定的更改块中包括到相应地调用之前方法由。Calling the method causes all subsequent changes to be included in the specified change block until a corresponding call to the method is made. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和方法来创建一个更改块。The following example shows how to use the and methods to create a change block. [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#BeginChangeEndChangeCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/BeginChangeEndChangeExample.cs#beginchangeendchangecodeexampleinline1)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#BeginChangeEndChangeCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/beginchangeendchangeexample.vb#beginchangeendchangecodeexampleinline1)]

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它允许你通过使用类处理程序，而不一个实例处理程序处理派生类中的匹配事件。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it lets you handle the matching event from derived classes by using a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下，匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能已由子元素，它不一定是调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event might have been raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that invokes handlers. 因此，您的实现需要考虑事件参数的源属性 （并且不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。Therefore, your implementation needs to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类沿路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种情况是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理。One scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能已由子元素，它不一定是调用处理程序的元素。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that invokes handlers. 因此，您的实现需要考虑事件参数的源属性 （并且不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。Therefore, your implementation needs to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of can choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种情况是事件的参数，将该事件标记为已处理。One scenario is to take the arguments of the event and mark the event as handled.
